Summary: The Oriental Couple that run this place, are Very Friendly, and are Christians. The type of things that happen at other properties, do Not happen here. The bed is Very Comfortable, and the property is extremely safe and quiet. My only complaint, is that they charge too much for a weekly rate.  Other than that, I would stay here, over Motel 6 down the street, where all the alcoholic veterans stay, any day of the week. Only $65 per night. Great Deal !

Summary Heading: Too Crappy + Too Expensive = Horrible Business.
Summary: I was drinking at a nearby bar, so I decided I'll be responsible and spend the night at a nearby motel. Motel 6 was full, but they pointed to this motel and said they have the exact same price and have rooms open.  When I got there I felt like I am at a 1920s hostel. It stank, the flies were unbearable, and everything was so unbelievably old and worn. But it's ok, they're cheap. Right?  Knocked on the glass. A middle-age Asian guy came to the window. He could barely put a sentence together. First he said they have no rooms. Then he thought about it for a few seconds, then said that they do. Then proceeded to charge me $80 for the night.  I looked the receipt. Looked back at the stinky old place. Told him it's too much for the conditions of the place, and that I don't think I can
Room tip: Stay off the first street if you can't get into Motel 6. Go on 4th street instead, much...

Summary Heading: I love that place see you soon.
Summary: I read one of the review someone sent and bother me I just had to comment I have been         going there since 2009 and continue to go I personally have never seen ants or any kind of crawlers or bugs ,second the cleaning ladies well I have met three great ones and a janitor and as soon as I register I see the cleaning ladies and recieve there welcome and third, if it wasnt for a great, good man that I met I wouldnt have met this great place where we continue to remember good   memories as our love  continues to grow thank you Grand Plaza

This place is a mess . The rooms are disgusting . Ants everywhere . Blankets are itchy . It was a nightmare don't stay there . The time being there i did not see a cleaning lady . The rooms small like cigarets . I prefer to sleep in my mini van . Not worth spending your money here. I prefer motel 6 a least .
